remarks: Restriction to the second part of a piecewise defined function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
oprpiece1.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
oprpiece1.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
oprpiece1.3 $e |- A <_ B $.
oprpiece1.4 $e |- R e. _V $.
oprpiece1.5 $e |- S e. _V $.
oprpiece1.6 $e |- K e. ( A [,] B ) $.
oprpiece1.7 $e |- F = ( x e. ( A [,] B ) , y e. C |-> if ( x <_ K , R , S ) ) $.
oprpiece1.9 $e |- ( x = K -> R = P ) $.
oprpiece1.10 $e |- ( x = K -> S = Q ) $.
oprpiece1.11 $e |- ( y e. C -> P = Q ) $.
oprpiece1.12 $e |- G = ( x e. ( K [,] B ) , y e. C |-> S ) $.
oprpiece1res2 $p |- ( F |` ( ( K [,] B ) X. C ) ) = G $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d P x $.
$d Q x $.
